data.title: JHANJI HEMNATH SARMA COLLEGE
data.text:
DODL, DU Jhanji Hemnath Sarma College Study Centre:

Coordinator: Mr Indra Sen Baro, Assistant Professor, Dept of English

Considering the necessity of enabling the youths and who are unable to prosecute higher education due to economic or other reasons of the greater area of Jhanji, the collegeoffers some programmesunder Dibrugarh University Distance Education. The learners can upgrade or acquire knowledge through our DODL, DU study centre in various subjects through semester mode both in undergraduate and post graduate programmes.

I. Undergraduate Programme: B. A (General) and B.A (Honors)

Subjects offered: Assamese, Economics, Political Science, Sociology, B.Com (General)

Eligibility: H. S passed from a recognized Council / University

II. Post Graduate Programme:

Subject offered: Assamese, English, Economics, Education, Mathematics, Political Science, Sociology, and Commerce

Eligibility: Graduate from a recognized university.

Jhanji H N S College Accredited Study Centre(ASC):

Jhanji H N S College acts as Accredited Study Centre (ASC) to run the H. S. level course under Assam State Open School (ASOS). To know details contact to the Coordinator of the centre.

Eligibility: H. S. L. C passed from a recognized Board

Krishna Kanta Handique State Open University Study Centre

Coordinator: Dr Santana Dutta, Assistant Professor, Dept of Sociology

The KKHSOU, Jhanji Hemnath Sarma College Study centre has been providing opportunity of Higher Education through Distance mode since 2007. It provides courses of BMC and B.A. the Centre also provides P.G. Courses in Assamese, English, education, Political science, Sociology, economics and Business Administration. The Coordinator of the Centre is Dr. Santana Dutta, Assistant Professor, Department of Sociology. For details Contact no: 9435353754
